entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
